tool_description: Collects passages related to specific themes or topics across multiple religious traditions and texts.

theme_keywords.description: Keywords describing the theme or topic

theme_category.description: Broad category: ethics, spirituality, prophecy, worship, or social_justice

passage_length.description: Preferred length: verse, paragraph, or chapter

max_passages.description: Maximum number of passages to return (5-50)

include_commentary.description: Whether to include brief commentary on theme relevance

diversity_priority.description: Prioritize diversity across traditions over relevance

original_language_notes.description: Include notes about original language terms

error_messages: Invalid theme keywords: Provide at least one meaningful keyword.
Unsupported traditions: One or more traditions are not recognized.
Invalid theme category: Use one of [ethics, spirituality, prophecy, worship, social_justice].
Invalid parameters: max_passages must be between 5-50, passage_length must be verse/paragraph/chapter.
Theme too narrow: No passages found for the specified theme in selected traditions.
Theme too broad: Refine keywords to get more focused results.
usage: Provide theme_keywords and traditions arrays; optionally configure theme_category, passage_length, max_passages, and various boolean flags. Returns thematically organized passages from multiple traditions.

theme_relevance.description: Brief explanation of how each passage relates to the theme

tradition_distribution.description: Summary of how passages are distributed across traditions

total_found.description: Total number of thematically related passages found
